title: Safe
info: Free shipping when you spend over $100. We always guarantee safe delivery to your door.

title: Professional
info: We're here to help! There isn't a question too big or too small. Give us a call, email or chat with a Fiddlershop Family member

title: Happiness
info: Fiddlershop is built to serve and support the string community. Making customers happy is our forte!

title: 25-Day
info: We know that shopping online can be tricky. You can try and return within 25 days for a full refund.
